name: A Zombie Ate The Title Name
name_original: A Zombie Ate The Title Name
description:
Welcome to "A Zombie Ate The Title Name"!

This is a small 2D Zombie Shooter, where you have to survive never ending hordes of Zombies.
If they hit you, you are dead, so it's all about surviving as long as possible.

Killing Zombies gives you money for the trader, but he's not always opened and if he opens, you better be fast, because his day at work is very short!
At the Trader Store you can get upgrades for your weapons, so that you can deal even more damage to the Zombies, which you need to, because they will get more life the longer you live!

To kill those Zombies, you have two weapons: a pistol with unlimited ammunition and a shotgun, for which you must buy or find ammunition.

And as if that weren't enough, you're still looking for the next food box to satisfy your sheer endless hunger.

So, what are you waiting for? Get this game and beat those Zombies, so that you're not gonna end like the title of this game!

Game Controls:

WASD / Arrow Keys = Move Around
Left Mouse Button = Shoot
Right Mouse Button = Change Weapon
